name: All Collaboration Artworks
description:
Collaboration of 33 artists, masters of calligraphy and lettering from all over Russia. 
 
The basis of the project is the Cyrillic alphabet, one letter = one artist, the author's point of view and no restrictions in creativity.  
 
The goal of the project is to expand the perception boundaries of artists, to show the community the possibilities of interaction with digital art. 
 
 
ALL PROCEEDS FROM THE SALE OF THE ART WILL BE USED TO ORGANIZE CHARITY MASTER CLASSES AND WORKSHOPS FOR 8TH-11TH GRADERS IN REMOTE PARTS OF THE COUNTRY. 
 
The team will tell the kids how to realize their creative potential even in the absence of resources and teach them the basics of calligraphy, lettering and design.
